languages.text: "И пообещать, что наша церковь будет молиться за вас. Хоть вы и не избрали культ святого Друза в ближайшие друзья, вы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}щедро жертвовали{/d} на наше дело, и мы не забудем ваше имя на литургиях".

"And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
languages.original_text: "И пообещать, что наша церковь будет молиться за вас. Хоть вы и не избрали культ святого Друза в ближайшие друзья, вы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}щедро жертвовали{/d} на наше дело, и мы не забудем ваше имя на литургиях".

traits.locale_text: "And to promise that our church will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the cult of Saint Drusus among your closest friends, you have made generous donations to our cause and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And to promise that our church will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the cult of Saint Drusus among your closest friends, you have made generous donations to our cause and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And to promise that our church will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest friends, you have made generous donations to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “我还会保证，我们的教会会为你祈祷。虽然圣德鲁苏斯教派并不是你最亲密的盟友，但{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}你依然为我们的事业慷慨解囊{/d}，我们会在颂歌中传唱你的名字。”
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: “我还会保证，我们的教会会为你祈祷。虽然圣德鲁苏斯教派并不是你最亲密的盟友，但你依然为我们的事情慷慨解囊，我们会在颂歌中传唱你的名字。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「教会があなたのために祈ることを約束します。あなたは聖ドルスス教団を仲間だとは認めませんでしたが、私達に{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}多額の寄付{/d}をしてくださいましたね。なので、私達はあなたの名前は決して忘れません」
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: 「教会があなたのために祈ることを約束します。あなたは聖ドルスス教団を仲間だとは認めませんでしたが、私達に{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}多額の寄付{/d}をしてくださいましたね。なので、私達はあなたの名前は決して忘れません」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Y para prometerle que nuestra misión rezará por usted. Aunque ha elegido no tener al Culto de San Drusus entre sus amigos más cercanos, ha hecho {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}donaciones generosas{/d} a nuestra causa, y recordaremos su nombre en nuestras ceremonias».
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: «Y para prometerle que nuestra iglesia rezará por usted. Aunque ha elegido no tener al Culto de San Drusus entre sus amigos cercanos, ha hecho donaciones generosas a nuestra causa, y recordaremos su nombre en nuestras ceremonias».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Und um zu versprechen, dass die Mission für Euch beten wird. Auch wenn Ihr entschieden habt, den Kult des Heiligen Drusus nicht in den Kreis Eurer engsten Vertrauten aufzunehmen, habt Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}großzügig für unsere Sache gespendet{/d}. Wir werden uns in unseren Liturgien an Euren Namen erinnern."
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: "Und um zu versprechen, dass unsere Kirche für Euch beten wird. Auch wenn Ihr entschieden habt, den Kult des Heiligen Drusus nicht in Euren engsten Freundeskreis aufzunehmen, habt Ihr großzügig für unsere Sache gespendet. Wir werden uns in unseren Liturgien an Euren Namen erinnern."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Je suis également venu vous assurer que notre mission priera pour vous. Même si vous n'avez pas accepté le Culte de Saint Drusus dans votre cercle de confiance, vous vous être {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}{mf|montré généreux|montrée généreuse}{/d} envers notre cause. Nous n'oublierons pas de mentionner votre nom dans nos liturgies. »
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis également venu vous assurer que notre église priera pour vous. Même si vous n'avez pas accepté le culte de Saint Drusus dans votre cercle de confiance, vous vous être {mf|montré généreux|montrée généreuse} envers notre cause. Nous n'oublierons pas de mentionner votre nom dans nos liturgies. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Bir de misyonun, sizin için dua etmeye söz verdiğini iletmeye. Her ne kadar Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nı en yakın destekçileriniz arasına katmamış olsanız da davamız için {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}cömert bağışlarda{/d} bulundunuz. Ayinlerimizde sizin isminizi de anacağız."
languages.original_text: "And to promise that the mission will pray for you. Although you chose not to place the Cult of Saint Drusus among your closest confidants, you have made {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}generous donations{/d} to our cause, and we will remember your name in our liturgies."

traits.locale_text: "Ve de misyonun, sizin için dua etmeye söz verdiğini iletmek için. Her ne kadar Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nı en yakın çevrenize dâhil etmemiş olsanız da, davamız için {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Mid}cömert bağışlarda{/d} bulundunuz ve ayinlerimizde sizin isminizi de anacağız."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
